name: acidity
description: Acidity is a term used for a set of symptoms caused by excess production of acid by the gastric glands of the stomach. The stomach normally secretes hydrochloric acid which is required for the breakdown and digestion of food we eat.

name: Acid Reflux
description: Acid reflux is a common condition that features a burning pain, known as heartburn, in the lower chest area. It happens when stomach acid flows back up into the food pipe. Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) is a more severe form of acid reflux and can cause significant discomfort.
symptom: Sensation of a Lump in the Throat

name: acne
description: Acne is a skin condition that occurs when your hair follicles become plugged with oil and dead skin cells. It causes whiteheads, blackheads or pimples. Acne is most common among teenagers, though it affects people of all ages.

name: ADHD
description: Attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is a neurodevelopmental disorder affecting both children and adults. It is described as a persistent pattern of inattention and/or hyperactivity-impulsivity that interferes with functioning or development.

name: AIDS / HIV
description: HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) is a virus that attacks cells that help the body fight infection, making a person more vulnerable to other infections and diseases. It is spread by contact with certain bodily fluids of a person with HIV, most commonly during
foodAvoid: Soft cheeses made from unpasteurized milk

name: alleriges
description: An allergy is a reaction by your immune system to something that does not bother most other people.

name: Allergic Rhinitis
description: Allergic rhinitis is a diagnosis associated with a group of symptoms affecting the nose. These symptoms occur when you breathe in something you are allergic to, such as dust, animal dander, or pollen.
symptom: Pressure in the Nose and Cheeks

name: Alcohol Abuse / Alcoholism
description: Alcoholism, now called alcohol use disorder (AUD), refers to an addiction to alcohol. A person with this condition can no longer control their consumption of alcohol and they will become ill if they try to stop suddenly.
symptom: Spending a Lot of Time Drinking

name: Alzheimer's Disease
description: Alzheimer's disease is a progressive disorder that causes brain cells to waste away (degenerate) and die. Alzheimer's disease is the most common cause of dementia â€” a continuous decline in thinking, behavioral and social skills that disrupts a person's ability to function independently.

name: Arthritis
description: Arthritis is the swelling and tenderness of one or more of your joints. The main symptoms of arthritis are joint pain and stiffness, which typically worsen with age.

name: Asthma
description: Asthma is a condition in which your airways narrow and swell and produce extra mucus. This can make breathing difficult and trigger coughing, wheezing and shortness of breath.

name: Back Pain
description: Back pain, also known as dorsalgia, is pain felt in the low or upper back

name: Cancer
description: Cancer is a group of diseases involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body.

name: Cardiac diseases
description: Cardiovascular disease generally refers to conditions that involve narrowed or blocked blood vessels that can lead to a heart attack, chest pain (angina) or stroke.
symptom: Pain radiating to the arm, neck, jaw
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)
Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
description: Carpal tunnel syndrome is a condition that causes numbness, tingling and other symptoms in the hand and arm. Carpal tunnel syndrome is caused by a compressed nerve in the carpal tunnel, a narrow passageway on the palm side of your wrist.
symptom: Pain or discomfort in the wrist
Thumb, index, or middle finger weakness
Sensation of swelling in the hand

name: Childhood Diabetes
description: Type 1 diabetes is a chronic condition in which the pancreas produces little or no insulin.

name: Chronic Cold
description: Chronic cold is a condition in which the patient suffers from cold and cough for a long period of time.
symptom: Reduced sense of taste and smell
yoga: Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
description: Chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS) is a long-term illness with a wide range of symptoms. The most common symptom is extreme tiredness.

name: Common Cold and Cough
description: The common cold is a viral infection of your nose and throat (upper respiratory tract). It's usually harmless, although it might not feel that way. Many types of viruses can cause a common cold.
symptom: Slight body aches or a mild headache
yoga: Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Constipation
description: Constipation is a condition in which there is difficulty in emptying the bowels, usually associated with hardened feces.
symptom: Feeling of blockage in the rectum
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Dengue Fever
description: Dengue fever is a mosquito-borne tropical disease caused by the dengue virus. Symptoms typically begin three to fourteen days after infection.
symptom: Mild bleeding (such a nose bleed, bleeding gums, or easy bruising)

name: Depression
description: Depression is a mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest. Also called major depressive disorder or clinical depression, it affects how you feel, think and behave and can lead to a variety of emotional and physical problems.
symptom: Feeling sad or having a depressed mood
Loss of interest or pleasure in activities once enjoyed
Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much
Loss of energy or increased fatigue
Difficulty thinking, concentrating or making decisions

name: Diabetes
description: Diabetes is a disease that occurs when your blood glucose, also called blood sugar, is too high. Blood glucose is your main source of energy and comes from the food you eat.
symptom: Tingling or numbness in hands or feet
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Dysmenorrhea
description: Dysmenorrhea is the medical term for pain with menstruation. There are two types of dysmenorrhea: primary and secondary.
yoga: Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclining Bound Angle Pose)
Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Eczema
description: Eczema is a condition wherein patches of skin become inflamed, itchy, red, cracked, and rough. Blisters may sometimes occur.

name: Enlarged Prostate
description: An enlarged prostateis a condition in which the prostate gland is enlarged and not cancerous
symptom: Dribbling at the end of urination
Inability to completely empty the bladder

name: Epistaxis
description: Epistaxis is the medical term for a nosebleed. It is a common occurrence and is rarely a cause for concern.

name: Eye problems
description: Eye problems can be caused by a number of different conditions, including infections, injuries, and systemic diseases.

name: Kidney Stone
description: Kidney stones are hard deposits made of minerals and salts that form inside your kidneys.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Leukoderma
description: Leukoderma is a skin condition characterized by white patches on the skin.
symptom: Loss of Color in the Tissues
Change in Color of the Mucous Membranes
Loss of Color in the Retina
Change in Color of the Hair
Change in Color of the Skin
Change in Color of the Iris
Change in Color of the Nails
Change in Color of the Skin

name: Hepatitis
description: Hepatitis is an inflammation of the liver that can be caused by a group of viruses.
symptom: Yellowing of the Skin and Eyes (Jaundice)
Pain in the Upper Right Side of the Abdomen

name: Macular Degeneration
description: Macular degeneration is a chronic eye disease that causes vision loss in the center of your field of vision.
symptom: Dark, Empty Area in the Center of Vision

name: Menopause
description: Menopause is the time that marks the end of your menstrual cycles.

name: Migraine
description: A migraine can cause severe throbbing pain or a pulsing sensation, usually on one side of the head.

name: Mouth Ulcers
description: Mouth ulcers are painful sores that appear in the mouth.

name: Fibromyalgia
description: Fibromyalgia is a disorder characterized by widespread musculoskeletal pain accompanied by fatigue, sleep, memory, and mood issues.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)
Viparita Karani (Legs Up the Wall Pose)

name: Muscular Dystrophy
description: Muscular dystrophy is a group of diseases that cause progressive weakness and loss of muscle mass.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Diabetes
description: Diabetes is a chronic condition that affects how your body turns food into energy.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Nosebleed
description: Nosebleeds are common and can be caused by a variety of factors.

name: Obesity
description: Obesity is a complex disease involving an excessive amount of body fat.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Osteoporosis
description: Osteoporosis is a condition that weakens bones, making them fragile and more likely to break.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Osteoporosis
description: Osteoporosis is a condition that weakens bones, making them fragile and more likely to break.

name: Piles
description: Piles are swollen blood vessels in the rectum or anus.
symptom: Difficulty in cleaning after bowel movements

name: Polycystic ovarian syndrome
description: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) is a hormonal disorder common among women of reproductive age.
yoga: Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fishes Pose)

name: Pickly Heat
description: Prickly heat is a skin condition that causes a rash of small, itchy bumps on the skin.

name: Psoriasis
description: Psoriasis is a skin condition that causes red, flaky, crusty patches of skin covered with silvery scales.
